prompts: Create a unique water-type Pokemon with a smooth body and long whiskers.
Imagine a fish-like creature that thrives in muddy waters and has vibrant blue patterns.
Design a Pokemon that can swim swiftly with its powerful fins and agile movements.
Give me a character that is playful and loves to splash around in wetlands.
Show me a whimsical water Pokemon with a round body and a cheerful expression.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a catfish, featuring colorful scales and an interesting shape.
Make a Pokemon known for its ability to sense vibrations in the water and react quickly.
